properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: secret key used for signing the tokent'

properties.name: jwt.expiration
properties.description: total time until the token is valid. Token will be invalid post the expiration'

properties.name: auth.excluded.path
properties.description: all the path that validation will be skipped for. This is useful for the endpoints that are not secured and do not require authentication. For example, the login endpoint.'
